hero.primary: Find peace and balance in your life
hero.secondary: Professional psychotherapy with empathy and understanding

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.description: I am a psychotherapist in training at the International Transactional Analysis Association. I provide individual and group psychotherapy for adolescents and adults, as well as couples therapy. I work with individuals dealing with eating disorders, anxiety disorders, challenges with identity formation and emotional expression, depression, codependent relationships, low self-esteem, social difficulties, and traumatic experiences. I am also deeply committed to supporting members of the LGBT+ community, offering them a space grounded in acceptance, understanding, and professional care. My work is rooted in the approach of transactional analysis, which focuses on helping clients understand the behavioral patterns present in themselves and their surroundings, especially within communication, as well as the roles we adopt in relationships. I adhere to the ethical code of psychologists and psychotherapists, building with each client a space based on trust, safety, and acceptance. To maintain the highest standards of my work, I continuously develop my skills by participating in courses, conferences, and professional training. I work under regular supervision. My priority is always to provide clients with a safe and supportive environment where they can feel understood and accepted. I am guided by strong ethical principles, deep respect, and genuine dedication. With passion and professionalism, I support individuals in improving their quality of life and in navigating emotional and social challenges. I warmly invite you to reach out and begin a shared journey toward greater well-being and mental health. I offer support to both adults and adolescents, providing care tailored to individual needs.

customerReviews.title: Customer Reviews
customerReviews.review1: "Thanks to therapy, we were able to rebuild our marriage. I wholeheartedly recommend it!"
customerReviews.review2: "Professional approach and tremendous support. For the first time, I feel truly understood."
customerReviews.review3: "Therapy helped me understand my emotions and learn to communicate better."

couplesTherapy.title: Couples and Marriage Therapy
couplesTherapy.description: Support in resolving conflicts, improving communication, and rebuilding connection within the relationship. Sessions are held in a safe and supportive environment.

transactionalTherapy.title: Psychotherapy in the Transactional Analysis Approach
transactionalTherapy.description: Individual therapeutic work focused on understanding behavioral patterns, developing self-awareness, and achieving lasting positive changes in life.
